1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: We kick off this season with 3 of the leading agencies in the world - D'Vision Model Management Warsaw, Elite Model Management Miami, and Touché Models Amsterdam. Check out how the likes of Cindy Crawford, Anja Rubik and Alexandra Madar got started as well as how an agency that produced two of the Top Model franchises run its empire.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Big things come from small packages. Boutique agencies are focusing more on quality than quantity. Future Faces Amsterdam, Sutherland Models Toronto and Iconic Management Berlin cater for a high-end niche such as Armani, Gucci, Prada, Galliano, Yamamoto, and Marchesa that require only the best and they must deliver the cream of the crop.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: In demand agencies such as L.A. Models, Montage Models Toronto and Vivien Models Sydney run fast paced well-oiled machinery that continues to produce quality talents and are often the "go-to" agencies for clients like Victoria's Secret, Chanel, Fendi, and countless more. With the likes of Sui He, Sanne Vloet, Emily Fox, Coco Rocha, Ine Neefs, and Nina Agdal on the booking portfolios, who wouldn't want to take the bait?

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Every agency's dream is to discover local talents and introduce them to the international market. Small town teens have now become international muses of fashion. Grace Models Moscow has created Natalia Vodianova, Rebel Models Warsaw conceived Marta Dyks, and Upfront Models Singapore is now shaping beauty queen Rathi Menon into an international icon.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Fashion capitals pride themselves for being influencers in the industry thus expectations from their players are high. These agencies are up for the challenge and have proven to be an indispensable source of talents. Let's see what's a day in the busy life inside UP Models in Paris, Boss Models in Johannesburg, and Francina Models in Barcelona.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: If you constantly produce at least one of the Top 50 Models in the World, then these agencies are picking and grooming them right. Dulcedo Management Montreal, ICE Model Management in Cape Town and New York Model Management are the sure place to go, having developed Elle Macpherson, Nikki Taylor, Valeria Mazza, Marc-André Turgeon, Jarrod Scott, Jason Anthony, and no. 1 male model of the world, Mathias.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Though getting into the international market is aspired, demand for local and regional markets are very lucrative and it is up to these agencies to supply the talents. Primo Management in Hong Kong, IT Model Management in L.A. and Paras Talent Management in Shanghai continue to provide outstanding models and develop local talents.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: On our premiere episode in the Agencies series, we visited three of the world's top agencies, in three different continents: Elite Model Management in Miami, in the United States, Model Plus in Warsaw, Poland, and Wilhelmina One in Thailand.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: On the second episode of our Agencies series, we visited three of the world's top agencies, in three different continents: Elite Model Management in Toronto, Canada, Lukovsky Model Agency in St. Petersburg, Russia and Next Model Management in Miami, Florida.

3.title: Agencies: Shanghai
3.plot: On the third installment of our Agencies series, we're featuring three European cities that houses three of of the world's top agencies: Elite Model Management Barcelona, Avant Models Russia, and Modus Vivendis Model Management Moscow.

4.title: Agencies: Shanghai
4.plot: Get to know how the iconic beauties like of Adriana Lima, Jon Kortajarena, and Inés Sastre started before they became the most sought after models of our time. We feature three of the most prominent talent agencies in Spain and Latin America: Trend Model Management (Spain), INforma Models (Colombia) and Civiles Buenos Aires (Argentina).

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Get to know how the iconic beauties like of Adriana Lima, Jon Kortajarena, and Inés Sastre started before they became the most sought after models of our time. We feature three of the most prominent talent agencies in Spain and Latin America: Trend Model Management (Spain), INforma Models (Colombia) and Civiles Buenos Aires (Argentina).

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Get to know the main players in the world of modeling agencies. For our new episode, we're visiting three well-established model management companies: Next Model Management in Miami, MC2 Model Management in New York and Lizbell Agency in Vancouver, Canada. From agents, bookers, scouts, managers, to casting directors, find out what it takes to become a successful model agency.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: An agency's main job is to represent fashion models, investing in the development of their talents so they can increase their status and experience. It's a notoriously tough industry to pursue, but every agency searches for something different and is on the constant pursuit of the next big name in fashion. We're featuring the model management companies: Wilhelmina Models Modeling Agency in Vancouver, Canada, Diva Modeling Agency in Dubai, and Jill Models Management in Belgium.

8.title: Boutiques
8.plot: Behind every successful model is a modeling agency made up of a team of hardworking professionals that are invested in the development of their talents. Let's have a look into these model management companies: Esteem Models Modeling Agency in Seoul, South Korea; Outlaws Model Agency in Cape Town, South Africa; and Magteam Model Management in Poland for a behind-the-scenes look at the Fresh Faces Poland Competition.

9.title: Celebrity Camps
9.plot: Behind every successful model is a modeling agency made up of a team of hardworking professionals that are invested in the development of their talents. Let's have a look into these model management companies: Esteem Models Modeling Agency in Seoul, South Korea; Outlaws Model Agency in Cape Town, South Africa; and Magteam Model Management in Poland for a behind-the-scenes look at the Fresh Faces Poland Competition.

10.title: Institutions
10.plot: Like with any business, there are no shortcuts. These agencies show just how challenging and rewarding the talent management industry can be in the fashion world. We have our final three model management companies: Prime Models Management in Kiev, Ukraine, La Agencia Model Management in Bogota, Columbia, and Traffic Models in Madrid, Spain.

imdb.plot outline: Take an inside look of what happens inside the world's top modeling agencies as they provide the essential element to fashion's multi-billion dollar industry - the models. From castings to trainings, go-sees to bookings, see how these professionals work with their talents in this very competitive, fast moving business.
imdb.title: Agencies
plot: Take an inside look of what happens inside the world's top modeling agencies as they provide the essential element to fashion's multi-billion dollar industry - the models. From castings to trainings, go-sees to bookings, see how these professionals work with their talents in this very competitive, fast moving business.::Bigfoot Entertainment
